verbs.description: [ARG0: attorney general] [V: says] [ARG1: kratom a supplement used as opioid alternative is legal in tennessee] the attorney general for the state of tennessee published an opinion on the use of pure kratom stating the botanical supplement is legal in tennessee attorney washington d c nashville bethany cook united states general herbert slatery iii tennessee tennessee bureau of investigation food and drug administration memphis fda tbi fibromyalgia attorney general michael jones clarksville heroin federal drug administration dea
